About.paragraph: Hi Everyone, I am Narayan Pote from Pune, India. I am Profesional MERN Stack Developer. Currently working in Laboni media solution.
Why: Learning and digging into new Technology

Team.name: Ekal digital
Team.job: Ekal digital is MERN stack project it is Election System would have Candidate registration , document verification , events, nominee list to show the region wise winner candidate details.

Team.name: The PNBS
Team.job: PNBS is a Online Pooja and meal booking application built in MERN Stack in this application authenticated user can login and register. user can view live pooja streming.

Team.name: React todolist
Team.job: A simple CRUD todo list application built with React

Team.job: This code will give you idea how to upload multiple images using multer and display those images by storing name to the mongoDB db and displaying in React.
